name: Minus
summary: Increases the user's Special Attack stat by 50% if they enter a Double Battle with a Pok√©mon with the ability Plus
viability: In singles, this is useless. In Doubles and Triples, however, this can serve for some fun gimmicks, especially for Manectric. Manectric has a great Special Attack stat, and for it to be raised by one stage can and will make all the difference.
